entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to unwind exception on Xunit #79919
    8.0.0
  • `MetricsEventSource` Not Publishing `UpDownCounter` For `dotnet-counters`/`dotnet-monitor`? #79916
  • `QuicStream.WritesClosed` continuation ran before the Quic reset frame is sent? #79911
  • Android crash when using AOT+LLVM #79910
    7.0.x
  • Blazor WASM Error on iOS Safari - RangeError: Out of Memory #79909
  • [mono] System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceTest.AllSubscriberStress test very slow on Mono #79906
  • Binding collection is not working for options in .net 7.0.1 - it is working in version 7.0.0 and below #79904
  • Composite ReadyToRun fails when RelativePath has a path component #79902
  • How do I get a COM object in Runsimpersonated? #79900
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should prefer verbatim-strings #79895

Closed

  • Can StringInfo performance be improved? #79873
  • Headers.TryAddWithoutValidation can still have side effects on the value #79915
  • dotnet-dump makes process to double its used memory and fails #71472
    8.0.0
  • MVC Scaffolding and XmlTransforms -- Web.config #79838
  • JsonStringEnumConverter没有对Enum的自定义JsonPropertyNameAttribute处理 #79903
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 12/15/2022 8:20:21 PM #79877
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 11/3/2022 4:18:41 AM #78815
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 12/7/2022 12:36:41 PM #79605
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 142 Regressions on 12/7/2022 10:10:38 AM #79607
    8.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Delete_MultipleFilters - DirectoryNotFoundException #504
    8.0.0
  • TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests require 104GB free #77012
    8.0.0
  • Function declaration causes completely unrelated code to perform much worse (2x slower) #12151
    Future
  • LSRA Reg Optional: Folding of operations using a tree temp #6863
    Future
  • LSRA Reg Optional: Folding of read-modify-write mem operations #6862
    Future
  • [Perf] Investigate bimodal swings of BenchI/Fib #9818
    8.0.0
  • Use runtime build infrastructure for tools.illink subset #78334
    8.0.0
  • LSRA: Heuristics for callee saved reg allocation. #6824
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync ILLink to latest dotnet/linker commits #79918
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Include zero-sized diffs in the set of textual diffs generated #79917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • enable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws again #79914
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Handle `LCL_FLD_ADDR` in TreeLifeUpdater #79913
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Decommit mark array when decommitting region #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up tar file at the end of WriteEntry_LongFileSizeAsync test #79907
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • fix TLS resume with client certificates #79898
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fixing compressed singlefile scenario on osx-arm64 #79894
    area-Single-File

Merged

  • Avoid delegate allocation in generic cycle detector #79842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix diagnostics found with new analyzer - CA1853 #79896
    area-Meta
  • Update WasmBase::IsSupported not to use backing field #79884
    arch-wasm
  • TarReader should dispose underlying stream if leaveOpen is false #79899
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher: recreate file/directory on cleanup #79901
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Disable failing outerloop tests with ActiveIssue #79908
  • More preparation for JIT\Regression test merging #79697
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Int32: Fixed double space in comments for Parse #79897
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • createdump: only dump committed memory #79853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fixes InvalidCastException when using other attributes #79854
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [STJ SourceGen] Use Roslyn4.4 target when testing #79890
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • [release/7.0] Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79870
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix size regression from enum sorting #79845
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project referencing executable project fail with NETSDK1151 to `dotnet publish` when specifying -r option. #29642
  • Issue occurred when running dotnet clean command on console #29641

PullRequests

Created

  • add class templates #29655
    Area-dotnet new
  • Adjust conditional params tests #29645
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates
  • Update the macOs version #29644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Unskip `Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works` #29640
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29629
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2072019 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247
  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
  • Champion: "&&= and ||= assignment operators" #1718
    Likely Never

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contract failure in AbstractPullDiagnosticHandler.GetIdToPreviousDiagnosticParams #66107
  • Contract failure in PreviewSolutionCrawlerRegistrationService.UnregisterAsync on disposal of tools options preview #66106
  • Invoking GetSemanticModel causes a signal 11 code 1 crash on Android .NET 7.0.1 #66105
  • SourceGenerators in shared compilation can cause MissingMethodException #66104
  • DebugType does not default to "none" for Release configuration #66103
  • Smart break line should support `ForEachVariableStatementSyntax` #66102
  • Syntax error parsing generic method group with null-forgiving operator with generic type argument #66101
  • What is the best approach to create diagnostics which relies on symbol references? #66100

PullRequests

Created

  • Move constants to RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66097
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66108
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Move VS specific option storage locations to VS layer #66042
    Area-IDE
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Define Content-Length for Range Normalization in FileStreamResultExecutor.cs #45734
  • Request timeouts middleware #45732
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #45730
  • ASP.Net Razor Pages -> Cross Page Posting #45733
  • Razor pages with runtime compilation enabled throw exception when creating models using the C# 11 'required' keyword #45725
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .NET 7 ErrorBoundary is not catching exceptions raised in async methods returning a ValueTask #45724

Closed

  • Nullable `[FromQuery]` primitive says "The value 'null' is not valid" #45500
  • Case insensitivity in enum route binding #45590
  • Perf improvement: json #45697
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction #45703
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextSansFilter #45716
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #45721
  • Blazor exception thrown when visiting a non-existent url and then trying to interact with page when RenderMode="Server" #40056
    .NET 8 Planning
  • publish folder recursively #45708
  • `CookieOptions.HttpOnly` XML code comment doesn't match online documentation. #45726
  • Add support for passing Metadata Seed to the underlying oidc-client in WASM Authentication #40286
    Backlog
  • GrpcHttpApi Exceptions Not getting Logged #34523
    Backlog
  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted. #45706
  • Provide access to parsed route parameters and method body parameters in authorization filters #45698
  • After upgrade from .NET6 To .NET 7 (AddScoped IHostEnvironmentAuthenticationStateProvider) lifetime loading without ending #45583

PullRequests

Created

  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735

Merged

  • Resolve parameter name with FromRouteAttribute in tooling #45720
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Add support for TLS to Kestrel on macOS #45722
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2072400 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix cookie null regression #45715
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add service manager and reflection based service discovery #3448

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Request to add function to Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.EntryHandler. #12276
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync generates "Attempt to invoke virtual method 'boolean android.view.View.isInLayout()' on a null object reference" #12275
  • HotReload doesn't work on .Net7 when targeting Windows (it seems to work on Android) #12274
  • CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled="False" still scrolls with tab navigation #12272
    Backlog
  • CarouselView items are focusable #12271
    Backlog
  • Is there a way how we could create apps for Windows Phone with maui (The Lumia ones)? #12270
  • Infinite rendering loop when Rectangle placed in an AbsoluteLayout #12268
  • Requesting Bluetooth permissions on Android 12+ at runtime #12264
  • Apk file size degradation transition field to 7.0.52 #12263
  • Blazor UI Freezes entirely on .NET 7 #12262
  • Binding `Content` Property of `ContentView` to a nested property would result in re-parenting error on Android #12261

Closed

  • Splash screen does not show when running in debugger #12254
  • IOS Build is crashing without MAC Connection #12197
  • The system tray in WeatherTwentyOne is crashing when publishing as exe #12081
  • custom font on android only partly loaded: #11995
  • some images are rendered at the bottom of the page on ios #11996
  • iOS - Button in CollectionView footer auto expands to full width unless wrapped in another StackLayout #12045
  • MAUI Windows Build - ScrollView Scrolled Event arrives too late!! #12068
  • maui blazor ios iframe #12012

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Essentials Screenshot API Docs #12269
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12265
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12260
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Allow CommunityToolkit to avoid reflection to access the CollectionView controller #12258
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optionally replace subqueries with common table expressions (CTEs) to improve readability of debug logs. #29918
  • Configuration to opt out of occasionally problematic SaveChanges optimizations #29916
    7.0.x
  • Entity Framework Core generates a Foreign Key to the wrong table when using Entity Splitting #29915
  • Migration trying to make foreign key to a synonym #29914
  • Casting down in TPH should filter by the discriminator when accessing properties mapped to shared columns #29913
  • How to get rid of warning: The decimal property 'id' is part of a key on entity type 'SampleTable'? #29912

Closed

  • Query Best Practices for TPH and filtered data #29911
  • SaveChanges creates an empty Merge query statement, transactions are probably not garanteed, consequential damage: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): The MERGE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint #29905
  • Please add methods for ExecuteInsert & ExecuteInsertAsync #29894
  • Issue with nested owned types and nullability #29868
  • Replacing PK to PK dependent with different type fails using in-memory provider #29875
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Cosmos create too many IServiceProvider #29872

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7/0] Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29920
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow service properties typed as object #29919
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917

Updated

  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808
